effect.scarlet_violet: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Changes the target’s type to Water.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Changes the target’s type to Water.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Changes the target’s type to Water.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.
